pytket-ionq¶

pytket-ionq is an extension to pytket that allows pytket circuits to be executed on IonQ’s quantum devices.

pytket-ionq is available for Python 3.6, 3.7 and 3.8, on Linux, MacOS and Windows. To install, run:

pip install pytket-ionq

Note

Requires an IonQ account.

pytket.backends.ionq¶
